channel.title: How can i make a npc walk
channel.description: i need to know how to make a npc walk where i want it to walk and how i get it to walk after coding it into the autospawn.CFG file can any one help me?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 29, 2007, 07:56:46 PM[/size][hr]any one please i need help i wanna make my server look a bit better and if u want u can come to my server right now and look at it the ip is mewscape.no-ip.info btu i will say i did take out off the npcs to recode them in lol[br][size=1]Posted on: January 29, 2007, 08:10:24 PM[/size][hr]c'mon people i'm a bit of a new coder please help me out[br][size=1]Posted on: January 29, 2007, 08:19:49 PM[/size][hr]ffs guys come on i need help to improve my server

item.title: How can i make a npc walk
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

in autospawn.cfg, there are co-ordinates on the left, and to the right, there are range co-ordinates. These co-ordinates are like the barriers that they cannot go past. If you make sum range co-ordinatres, they will walk =D

Read full topic
